page.title: 16FARM STUDY-IVY HOUSE FARM 1
page.content: This{dairy}farm represents a number of small {farming}enterprises in this area.The study was made by an interview with the farmer and examination of the farm.The farm is in the middle of Warton.The farmhouse stands among other buildings on the main road,Austrey Road.The{fields}run down in a strip about 250 metres wide behind the farmhouse.The land is quite low and and fairly well drained.The farm has been passed from father to son.Mr Willis' grandfather owned the farm first.The farm was 32 hectares altogether.In the fields they grow grass,corn and potatoes.The grass covers 20 hectares and once the grass is cut it is stored as silage for the{ {cows}to eat in the winter.Another 6 hectares are used to grow corn which is ground and fed to the{cattle.}
